=Error handling=
==Library Class Error==
===Info===
Call the log function if a database-request fails. Only if a database-request fails!

===Example===
$this->error->log(*MESSAGE*, *IP*, *FUNCTION*, *CALLING FUNCTION*, *VARIABLES*);

 # *MESSAGE* _string_: The errormessage.
 # *IP* _string_: Ip-adress of the user... $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'].
 # *FUNCTION* _string_: Name of the class and function. "account/Register".
 # *CALLING FUNCTION* _string_: Name of the Class and function thats been called. "user/register".
 # *VARIABLES* _array (optional)_: An array of the variables involved. "array('Firstname' => 'Dennis').
